title: Fireball
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| [![Fireball.png](/images/a/ae/Fireball.png)](/File:Fireball.png) Fireball |                                                                                                                                  |
| :------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Level                                                                     | 5                                                                                                                                |
| School1                                                                   | [Conjuration](/Conjurations "Conjurations")                                                                                      |
| School2                                                                   | [Fire](/Fire_Magic "Fire Magic")                                                                                                 |
| Source(s)                                                                 | [Book of the Dragon](/Book_of_the_Dragon "Book of the Dragon") [Book of the Spheres](/Book_of_the_Spheres "Book of the Spheres") |
| [Casting noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                               | 5                                                                                                                                |
| [Spell noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                 | 15                                                                                                                               |
| Power Cap                                                                 | 200                                                                                                                              |
| Range                                                                     | 5                                                                                                                                |
| Flags                                                                     | Dir or target, Needs tracer                                                                                                      |

|   |                                  |
| - | -------------------------------- |
|   | Hurls an explosive ball of fire. |

| Spell Details                           |                       |
| :-------------------------------------- | --------------------- |
| Damage Formula                          | 3d(3.33+Power/6) fire |
| Max Damage                              | 3d37                  |
| [Max Power](/Spell_power "Spell power") | 200                   |
| Range                                   | 5                     |
| Targeting                               | Beam                  |
| To-hit                                  |                       |
| Special                                 | Explosion             |

**Fireball** is a level 5 [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations")/[Fire Magic](/Fire_Magic "Fire Magic") spell which launches an exploding gout of fire at the targeted tile, dealing undodgeable [fire](/Fire "Fire") damage to everything caught in the ensuing 3×3 explosion. This explosion can hit monsters outside your [line of sight](/Line_of_sight "Line of sight").

## Contents

- [1 Strategy](#Strategy)
  - [1.1 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [2 Monster Version](#Monster_Version)
- [3 History](#History)

## Strategy

Fireball is a good midgame attack spell. While it does less damage than [Starburst](/Starburst "Starburst"), Fireball always hits, can be fired an an angle, and has a lower spell level (thus, a lower MP cost). Since this spell ignores EV, it is great against annoying, hard-to-hit foes, like [spriggans](/List_of_spriggans "List of spriggans") or [killer bees](/Killer_bee "Killer bee").

If you learn the quirks of monster movement, you can potentially hit 8 monsters at a time with a single fireball. If your defenses are up to scratch, you may even want to take a hit or two to maximize your damage output, or to avoid running out of MP midfight.

### Tips & Tricks

- Fireball's explosion can hit from a tile outside [line of sight](/Line_of_sight "Line of sight"). While Fireball can't reach past the usual sight radius (even with [Vehumet](/Vehumet "Vehumet") support), it can be used to hit targets around corners, or through [fog](/Fog "Fog").
- Firing it at an opponent in melee range can be dangerous. Try to aim at a tile behind the foe you're engaged with, or the fireball will hit you.

* When fighting a single foe, aiming at a tile *diagonal and behind* the opponent will prevent you from being hit. See below for a diagram.

```
.........  .........
...###...  ....###..
...#*#...  ....#*#..
...##Y...  ....Y##..
....@....  ....@....
.........  .........

* = tile to aim at
```

## Monster Version

The monster version functions similarly to the player version.

The following enemies cast Fireball:

- R [![Azrael.png](/images/f/fa/Azrael.png)](/File:Azrael.png) **[Azrael](/Azrael "Azrael")** (3d20 damage)
- 2 [![Balrug.png](/images/2/21/Balrug.png)](/File:Balrug.png) **[Balrug](/Balrug "Balrug")** (3d23 damage)
- e [![Deep elf elementalist.png](/images/7/7b/Deep_elf_elementalist.png)](/File:Deep_elf_elementalist.png) **[Deep elf elementalist](/Deep_elf_elementalist "Deep elf elementalist")** (3d23 damage)
- q [![Draconian scorcher.png](/images/1/11/Draconian_scorcher.png)](/File:Draconian_scorcher.png) **[Draconian scorcher](/Draconian_scorcher "Draconian scorcher")** (3d26 damage)
- R [![Efreet.png](/images/f/f9/Efreet.png)](/File:Efreet.png) **[Efreet](/Efreet "Efreet")** (3d15 damage)
- O [![Erolcha.png](/images/a/a2/Erolcha.png)](/File:Erolcha.png) **[Erolcha](/Erolcha "Erolcha")** (3d14 damage)
- C [![Fire giant.png](/images/1/16/Fire_giant.png)](/File:Fire_giant.png) **[Fire giant](/Fire_giant "Fire giant")** (3d26 damage)
- h [![Hell hog.png](/images/b/be/Hell_hog.png)](/File:Hell_hog.png) **[Hell hog](/Hell_hog "Hell hog")** (3d20 damage)
- @ [![Margery.png](/images/0/03/Margery.png)](/File:Margery.png) **[Margery](/Margery "Margery")** (3d33 damage)
- p [![Occultist.png](/images/e/e8/Occultist.png)](/File:Occultist.png) **[Occultist](/Occultist "Occultist")** (3d21 damage)
- \* [![Orb of fire.png](/images/7/7b/Orb_of_fire.png)](/File:Orb_of_fire.png) **[Orb of fire](/Orb_of_fire "Orb of fire")** (3d43 damage)
- D [![Serpent of Hell (Gehenna).png](/images/a/aa/Serpent_of_Hell_%28Gehenna%29.png)](/File:Serpent_of_Hell_\(Gehenna\).png) **[Serpent of Hell (Gehenna)](/Serpent_of_Hell_\(Gehenna\) "Serpent of Hell (Gehenna)")** (3d27 damage)
- p [![Wizard.png](/images/c/c7/Wizard.png)](/File:Wizard.png) **[Wizard (monster)](/Wizard_\(monster\) "Wizard (monster)")** (3d19 damage)

## History

- Prior to [0.20](/0.20 "0.20"), [Delayed Fireball](/Delayed_Fireball "Delayed Fireball") was a spell based on Fireball. It could be learned for only two spell levels if you had already learned regular Fireball. The spell had the same mechanics as regular Fireball, but could be stored for later use.
html:
Fireball

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
 Fireball
Level 5
School1 Conjuration
School2 Fire
Source(s) Book of the Dragon
Book of the Spheres
Casting noise 5
Spell noise 15
Power Cap 200
Range 5
Flags Dir or target, Needs tracer
Hurls an explosive ball of fire.
Spell Details
Damage Formula 3d(3.33+Power/6) fire
Max Damage 3d37
Max Power 200
Range 5
Targeting Beam
To-hit
Special Explosion

Fireball is a level 5 Conjurations/Fire Magic spell which launches an exploding gout of fire at the targeted tile, dealing undodgeable fire damage to everything caught in the ensuing 3×3 explosion. This explosion can hit monsters outside your line of sight.

Contents

  • 1 Strategy
    • 1.1 Tips & Tricks
  • 2 Monster Version
  • 3 History

Strategy

Fireball is a good midgame attack spell. While it does less damage than Starburst, Fireball always hits, can be fired an an angle, and has a lower spell level (thus, a lower MP cost). Since this spell ignores EV, it is great against annoying, hard-to-hit foes, like spriggans or killer bees.

If you learn the quirks of monster movement, you can potentially hit 8 monsters at a time with a single fireball. If your defenses are up to scratch, you may even want to take a hit or two to maximize your damage output, or to avoid running out of MP midfight.

Tips & Tricks

  • Fireball's explosion can hit from a tile outside line of sight. While Fireball can't reach past the usual sight radius (even with Vehumet support), it can be used to hit targets around corners, or through fog.
  • Firing it at an opponent in melee range can be dangerous. Try to aim at a tile behind the foe you're engaged with, or the fireball will hit you.
When fighting a single foe, aiming at a tile diagonal and behind the opponent will prevent you from being hit. See below for a diagram.
.........  .........
...###...  ....###..
...#*#...  ....#*#..
...##Y...  ....Y##..
....@....  ....@....
.........  .........

* = tile to aim at

Monster Version

The monster version functions similarly to the player version.

The following enemies cast Fireball:

  • R Azrael (3d20 damage)
  • 2 Balrug (3d23 damage)
  • e Deep elf elementalist (3d23 damage)
  • q Draconian scorcher (3d26 damage)
  • R Efreet (3d15 damage)
  • O Erolcha (3d14 damage)
  • C Fire giant (3d26 damage)
  • h Hell hog (3d20 damage)
  • @ Margery (3d33 damage)
  • p Occultist (3d21 damage)
  • * Orb of fire (3d43 damage)
  • D Serpent of Hell (Gehenna) (3d27 damage)
  • p Wizard (monster) (3d19 damage)

History

  • Prior to 0.20, Delayed Fireball was a spell based on Fireball. It could be learned for only two spell levels if you had already learned regular Fireball. The spell had the same mechanics as regular Fireball, but could be stored for later use.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Fireball&oldid=74724"
